author: SiewYan
body:
#### PR description:

Remove legacy EDModules, FlatEGunASCIIWriter, which, no longer been used.  

Related Issue: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/31061

No change is expected.

#### PR validation:

None

title: remove legacy EDModules: FlatEGunASCIIWriter
